pages.text:
Column one
Column one
Centered Around Community and Connection
Your Home Away From Home in Crystal River, Florida
Our dedication to creating a fun, community-oriented atmosphere for all guests is what sets us apart from the rest.
Column one
Unmatched Amenities
Modern Luxury RV Resort
From our paved, full hookup sites to the modern, luxury amenities, Sweet Citrus Acres is an exclusive outdoor retreat. Fish in our fully stocked seven-acre lake or soak in our stunning heated pool. Experience our convenient upscale facilities, or simply soak in the sweet Florida sunshine. We’ve thought of everything you’ll need for resort-level comfort.
Column one
Community Events & Activities
Unforgettable Community Experience
A home away from home in Crystal River, FL, our resort is tailored to community connection and neighborly care. Get ready for planned events, exciting activities, and unforgettable experiences with our 12,600 Clubhouse, onsite bar, gathering spaces, and more. Join us today, you’ll fit right in!
Column one
Meet Our Team
Experience Hospitality at its Finest!
At Sweet Citrus Acres RV Resort, our dedicated team is here to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. Our staff is intimately familiar with both the allure and challenges of RV travel, bringing their expertise and passion to enhance your experience. Always available to assist you in any way, our team prides itself on delivering top-notch service with a personal touch. From ensuring the cleanliness of our facilities to providing helpful local insights, we’re committed to making your stay at Sweet Citrus Acres exceptional.
Column one
Sweet Citrus Acres RV Resort
Luxury RV Community in Florida’s Lush Scenery
Unmatched Community Experience in Crystal River, FL
